Address.value: 5141 WEST 122ND STREET,SUITE 104, ALSIP, Illinois, 60803, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Capstone Holding Corp. is a growing platform of building products companies, focused on serving residential and commercial construction markets across the United States. Its current portfolio includes Instone, a leading national wholesale distributor of thin veneer stone and related masonry products. With over 30 years of operating history, Instone has established itself as the largest player in its category, offering a comprehensive range of manufactured and natural stone solutions.
